author: Lucy Bayly
title: Wall Street opens with gains across all three major averages
description: “We’re looking at the concept where we open sections of the country, and we’re also looking at the concept where you open up everything,” Trump said.
content:
Wall Street opened with gains across all three major averages on Wednesday after President Donald Trump said he was hoping to reopen the U.S., while European finance ministers failed to agree on a stimulus package to shore up their economy.
